name: OhioLottery
0:
”Alexa, ask Ohio Lottery for the latest Mega Millions numbers.”
”Alexa, ask Ohio Lottery when is the next Classic Lotto drawing?”
”Alexa, ask Ohio Lottery where is the closest place I can buy lottery tickets?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ohio lottery
Developer Terms of Use
des: Want to know the latest Ohio Lottery Classic Lotto numbers? Trying to find an Ohio retailer location near you that sells tickets? What time is the next drawing? Get the answers to your Ohio Lottery questions with the Ohio Lottery skill for Amazon Alexa. It's everything you need to stay up-to-date on the latest drawings, upcoming jackpot drawings and more. Enable the skill today and say, 'Alexa, Ask Ohio Lottery...' or 'Alexa, Open Ohio Lottery,' followed by your question.
